archimate:BusinessProcess.name: BP - Exchange & Recommande
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: After exchanges (tchat only ?), the prescriptor recommands the user by delivering a to do list and/or a shopping list and/or links to guides / doc on line To Do List : ordered list of actions/tasks (no notion of timeline) Shopping list : List of products, 1 to N, (no notion of availibility / stock)
